title: MMR at its best
body:
So this happened.

The plat player was just as surprised as I was. At least he was nice about it in post game chat. 

I'm all for shortening queue times, but when plats are getting dropped into my games it make the game unbalanced and no fun. What should have been a close game turned into a stomping.

replies.body: Ranked MMR has nothing to do with normals MMR. Evidently the players normals MMR was far below their ranked MMR, for whatever reason.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Ep0KQh79,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-26T01:53:06.425+0000)
>
> Ranked MMR has nothing to do with normals MMR. Evidently the players normals MMR was far below their ranked MMR, for whatever reason.

You think people would understand this by now right...?
Yeah I had a plat in my silver 1 game which was acceptable, but if you're in bronze it's kind of stupid and shouldn't be happening
